TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewPageEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当页导航按钮 (`CommandName` 控件中 ) 属性设置为 "Page" 的按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前，控件引发事件。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如取消分页操作。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 页导航按钮通常位于控件的页导航行中 。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 对象将传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许你确定用户所选择的页的索引，并指示应取消分页操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled. 若要取消分页操作，请将 对象的属性设置 为 `true` 。To cancel the paging operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 传递给事件处理方法的对象确定用户选择的页的索引，并取消分页操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to cancel the paging operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewPageIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewPageIndexChanging/CS/gridviewpageindexchangingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewPageIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewPageIndexChanging/VB/gridviewpageindexchangingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`newPageIndex` 参数的值。The value of the `newPageIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中显示的新页的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the new page to display in the control.

value.span: 要在 控件中显示的新页的索引。

span.span: The index of the new page to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 事件发生在 控件执行分页操作之前发生，因此 不能使用控件的属性来确定用户选择的页的索引。Because the event occurs before the control performs the paging operation, the property of the control cannot be used to determine the index of the page selected by the user. 使用 属性可确定用户所选页面的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the page selected by the user. > [!NOTE] > 在 事件期间， 属性仍包含之前显示的页的索引。During the event, the property still contains the index of the previously displayed page. 你还可以使用此属性，通过将用户设置为另一个值来以编程方式覆盖用户选择的页索引。You can also use this property to programmatically override the page index selected by the user by setting it to another value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定用户选择的页的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the page selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewPageIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewPageIndexChanging/CS/gridviewpageindexchangingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewPageIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewPageIndexChanging/VB/gridviewpageindexchangingvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The property is less than zero.
